name: UnderwOtter
description:
Dive for treasure and sell them to a talkative fisher dragon! Buy items to explore further down!! Be an otter!!!

The lake seems to hide a secret... is it related to the vaguely suspicious fisher dragon? Only one way to find out!

Controls:
- WASD to move (Joystick / Dpad on controller)
- Space to jump on land / dash underwater (A / B on Xbox controller)
- E to pick up / buy / sell items, or talk! (X / Y on Xbox controller)

Made with Godot Engine for Ludum Dare 48.
Rate my game here! https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/underwotter
